page.title: 14MUSIC IN NEWRY "POP"
page.content: The most popular "pop" groups this year are "Wham," "Duran Duran," "Frankie goes to Hollywood."The most popular solo artists are "Paul Young," "Howard Jones," "Madonna," "Nik Kershaw" and "Prince." There are a lot of pop programmes on television.The most popular programme is "Top Of The Pops."Forty-five minutes long it includes live groups, videos and the charts which show the best selling singles of the week.The highest point in the charts is number one.Paul Hardcastle is number one at the minute singing a song called "19."There are also album charts in which Paul Young, Howard Jones and Tears For Fears have all reached numnber one this year."The Rock And Pop Awards"round up the year.
